item.title: Home 26
item.dc:creator: tuananh
item.content:encoded:
Bluetooth Wireless Microphone Limitless singing Any time, any where Discover More Suitable for all occasions, friends gather, travel picnic, singing and singing, practical and strong. Watch Video    

Sing at home

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt

Sing with friends

Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris

Sing anytime

Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur

highlight features

High sensivity,
capture sound line

Automatic noise
reduction

TF Card/USB/
AUX support

Multi-functional
support

Aluminum alloy
handle

latest technology

Designed for great
sound quality

Suitable for all occasions, friends gather, travel picnic, singing and singing, practical and strong.

easy to use

Compatible with
many devices & app

Very good and quality microphone! The sound is clean, the speaker does not wheeze like on other microphones, the transmission of speech without distortion Eric Stark Customer Feedback

Buy it now

From$235Try SingIt risk-free with free shipping and 30-day returns Shop Now
